headline.main: Knox Bombed in Pacific Trip; Americans 'Masters' There; KNOX IS BOMBED ON PACIFIC TOUR

lead_paragraph: PEARL HARBOR, Jan. 29 (Delayed) -- Secretary of the Navy Frank Knox, back from a two-week aerial tour of the Pacific that took him to the Guadalcanal battlefront and subjected him to two air raids, met the press here today full of confidence that the Americans have proved themselves masters of the Japanese, and that resistance on Guadalcanal will end in thirty days.
abstract: Solomon Islands: Sec Knox cites US gains, Guadalcanal
